fr.cnrs.iees.uit.space.Sphere

    fr.cnrs.iees.uit
    uit stands for Universal Indexing Tree.
    fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing
    Various implementations of the IndexingTree interface.
    fr.cnrs.iees.uit.space
    Basic geometric classes internally used by IndexingTree.

      Methods in fr.cnrs.iees.uit.space that return Sphere 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Sphere Sphere.inSphere​(Box b)
      Computes the largest Sphere fully contained in a Box.
      static Sphere Sphere.newSphere​(Point centre, double radius)  
      static Sphere Sphere.outSphere​(Box b)
      Computes the smallest Sphere containing a Box.
      static Sphere Sphere.valueOf​(java.lang.String s)
      reads a Sphere value from a String - assumes the Sphere has been saved with the toString() method of a Sphere implementation
